title: Jan. 6 Committee Gives Trump More Time to Comply With Subpoena
description: The House committee investigating the Capitol attack said it was in discussions with the former president over his compliance ahead of an interview scheduled for this month.
dc:creator: Luke Broadwater
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:description: Representatives Liz Cheney and Bennie Thompson, the leaders of the House Jan. 6 committee, at the end of a June hearing.
